name: DESTROY THE ICE
description:
This game is about a  space soldier who, lost and left out by his friends on this frozen planet decides to destroy the frozen montain of his landing, which is guarded by the snow monster that has taken many soldiers life.

Explore the mountain, kill enemies, but most important, defeat the snow monster

CONTROLS

You can use  A and D to go left  and right, jump with SPACE and shoot and aim using your MOUSE 

DEV NOTES
